name: Yi Zhou 0017
content: HomeSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationYi ZhouHOWDY!I am an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Texas A&M University. Before, I worked as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at The University of Utah (2019-2024). I was a postdoc fellow in the Department of ECE at Duke University (2018-2019) supervised by Dr. Vahid Tarokh. I obtained a Ph.D. degree in ECE from The Ohio State University in 2018 under the supervision of Dr. Yingbin Liang. Research interests: LLMs and their applications to broad engineering fieldsNonconvex & stochastic optimization for MLReinforcement learning and multi-agent system control ML for EDA/CAD/HPC Google SitesReport abuseGoogle SitesReport abuse
